Detailed Description

UserFavoritesRequest, used to sync/retrieve/add/delete favorites for a certain user.

StringTable::stringCode UserFavoritesRequest::getStatus (   )  const [virtual]
 

Get the status of the request, returns stringcodes as defined in class StringTable.

StringTable::OK indicates a successfull transaction. StringTable::UNKNOWN will be returned before the request placket has been sent/reply packet has been received.

Returns:
status code

Implements RequestWithStatus.
